messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near GAMER-SOCIETY IN SPACE 823, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Snowdin station, we are detecting an extradimensional link opening nearby. Please brace yourselves for potential invaders on the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The extradimensional link is still open, it's very close by please look to eliminate it.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: As soon as that netherworld link goes down we believe we can supply drop you some genetics equipment

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It is on the surface, we believe it to be within the perimeter of your fence

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The genetics equipment has been dropped to where the nether link was, good work crew

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig.
